SELECT IDX as arId, (SELECT ITEM_NM FROM `AVP`.`AVP_ITEM_TB` AS IT WHERE IT.IDX = ART.ITEM_ID) as itemName, ART.AR_NM as arName, ART.SCRIPT as arScript, (SELECT FILE_SAVE_PATH FROM `AVP`.`AVP_FILE_TB` WHERE FILE_NAME = ART.AR_NM AND FILE_SRC='image') as arImgUrl, (SELECT FILE_SIZE FROM `AVP`.`AVP_FILE_TB` WHERE FILE_NAME = ART.AR_NM AND FILE_SRC='image') as arImgSize, (SELECT FILE_SAVE_PATH FROM `AVP`.`AVP_FILE_TB` WHERE FILE_NAME = ART.AR_NM AND FILE_SRC='video') as arVideoUrl, (SELECT FILE_SIZE FROM `AVP`.`AVP_FILE_TB` WHERE FILE_NAME = ART.AR_NM AND FILE_SRC='video') as arVideoSize, (SELECT FILE_SAVE_PATH FROM `AVP`.`AVP_FILE_TB` WHERE FILE_NAME = ART.AR_NM AND FILE_SRC='tts') as arTtsUrl, (SELECT FILE_SIZE FROM `AVP`.`AVP_FILE_TB` WHERE FILE_NAME = ART.AR_NM AND FILE_SRC='tts') as arTtsSize,
(SELECT NICK_NAME FROM `AVP`.`AVP_USER_TB` WHERE IDX = ART.CREATE_ID) as createUser, DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createDate, (SELECT NICK_NAME FROM `AVP`.`AVP_USER_TB` WHERE IDX = ART.UPDATE_ID) as updateUser, DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updateDate FROM `AVP`.`AVP_AR_TB` AS ART WHERE ART.IDX = #{arId};

SELECT IDX as arId, ( SELECT ITEM_NM FROM `AVP`.`AVP_ITEM_TB` WHERE IDX = ITEM_ID ) as itemName, AR_NM as arName, TARGET_ID as targetId, METADATA as metaData, AR_IMG_ID as arImgId, ( SELECT FILE_URL FROM `AVP`.`AVP_FILE_TB` WHERE FILE_ID = AR_IMG_ID ) as arImgUrl, IMG_SIZE as arSize, RECOG_IMG_ID as recogImgId, ( SELECT FILE_URL FROM `AVP`.`AVP_FILE_TB` WHERE FILE_ID = RECOG_IMG_ID ) as recogImgUrl, ( SELECT NICK_NAME FROM `AVP`.`AVP_USER_TB` WHERE IDX = CREATE_ID ) as createUser, DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createDate, ( SELECT NICK_NAME FROM `AVP`.`AVP_USER_TB` WHERE IDX = UPDATE_ID ) as updateUser, DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updateDate FROM `AVP`.`AVP_AR_TB` WHERE IDX = #{arId};
mapper.update: UPDATE `AVP`.`AVP_AR_TB` SET AR_NM = #{arUpdate.arName} , METADATA = #{arUpdate.metaData} , IMG_SIZE = #{arUpdate.arSize} , AR_IMG_ID = #{arUpdate.arImgId} , RECOG_IMG_ID = #{arUpdate.recogImgId} , UPDATE_DTTM = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , UPDATE_ID = #{arUpdate.updateId} , SCRIPT = #{} WHERE IDX = #{arUpdate.arId}
